original_text: And David was greatly distressed; for the people spake of stoning him, because the soul of all the people was grieved, every man for his sons and for his daughters: but David encouraged himself in the Lord his God.
korean_text: 백성들이 자녀들 때문에 마음이 슬퍼서 다윗을 돌로 치자 하니 다윗이 크게 다급하였으나 그의 하나님 여호와를 힘입고 용기를 얻었더라

sentences.original_text: for the people spake of stoning him
sentences.korean_translation: 백성들이 그를 돌로 치자고 말했기 때문이며

sentences.original_text: because the soul of all the people was grieved
every man for his sons and for his daughters
sentences.korean_translation: 각자 자기 아들들과 딸들을 잃었기 때문이었다
